game.name: MY SLIEM gets stronger after it dies
game.shortDescription: 《MY SLIEM gets stronger after it dies》is a fantasy RPG where you play as a weak slime. Through repeated rebirths, you grow stronger to defeat foes and uncover a conspiracy. In its top-down pixel world, you move, dodge, and cast spells—turning each death into power.
